name: Delivery Box (_Triangl, neget)
description:
A short platformer game about delivering an important box.
Featuring:
- A box!
- Puzzles!
- Storyline!

Arrow keys to move
Jump - C
Hold box - X
Interact - Z

Settings - Escape
Inventory - S

Credits
_Triangl - Programming, Soundtrack & Spriting
Nugget - Level Design & Storyline

Software: GDevelop
(amazing software!)


Shoutouts
Milk (Hester)
Darcy :>

Speedrun Clock starts on the level after the Menu.
You can re-bind controls in settings.

This is my first project and I'm tryna get into game dev.
Was pretty fun.
